<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.TeamDevLocalChangeBackoutVisible</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Used by Team Dev Local Change Back Out UI Action and Notice business rule</description> <name>TeamDevLocalChangeBackoutVisible</name> <script><![CDATA[var TeamDevLocalChangeBackoutVisible = Class.create(); TeamDevLocalChangeBackoutVisible.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractUpdateUIActionUtil, { initialize: function() { },
_userHasAccess: function(gr) { return (gr.getValue('instance').equals(GlideProperties.get('glide.apps.hub.current')) && gr.getValue('state').equals('new')); },
type: 'TeamDevLocalChangeBackoutVisible' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-09-29 18:56:51</sys_created_on> <sys_id>20bbd42747022200a03a19fbac9a7153</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>TeamDevLocalChangeBackoutVisible</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Team Development" source="com.snc.apps_hub">a43df8076d2220100acb70b35343309d</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_20bbd42747022200a03a19fbac9a7153</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-09-29 18:56:51</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>405</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
